EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Web App diagnostics w/Java & Javascript 10AM.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Web Application Diagnostics with Java and JavaScript
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Web Application Diagnostics with Java and JavaScript with Josh Long, Pivotal and Ashley Puls, New Relic. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Wednesday, April 30, 2014
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, UTC-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=667916468>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195617&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 667 916 468
Thank you,
